data.text: Deenei di hagatau o nia hagadili Adam. (Di madagoaa God ne hai nia daangada, Mee ne hai meemaa gii hai be Ia.5.1 Genesis 1.27-28
Mee ne hai meemaa taane mo di ahina, ga haga humalia meemaa ga haga ingoo bolo “Nia Daangada”)5.2 Matthew 19.4; Mark 10.6
Adam ne 130 ono ngadau, gei mee guu hai dana dama daane e hai be ia, ga haga ingoo a mee bolo Seth.
Nomuli, Adam ga mouli i nia ngadau e 800, gaa hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 930.
Seth ne 105 ono ngadau, gaa hai dana dama daane go Enosh,
ga mouli i nia ngadau e 807 gi nomuli. Mee guu hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 912.
Enosh ne 90 ono ngadau, gaa hai dana dama daane go Canaan,
ga mouli i nia ngadau e 815 gi nomuli. Mee guu hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 905.
Canaan ne 70, gaa hai dana dama daane go Mahalalel,
ga mouli i nia ngadau e 840 gi nomuli. Mee guu hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 910.
Mahalalel ne 65 ono ngadau, gaa hai dana dama daane go Jared,
ga mouli i nia ngadau e 830 gi nomuli. Mee guu hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 895.
Jared ne 162 ono ngadau, gaa hai dana dama daane go Enoch,
ga mouli i nia ngadau e 800 gi nomuli. Mee guu hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 962.
Enoch ne 65 ono ngadau, gaa hai dana dama daane go Methuselah.
Nomuli Enoch ga mouli hai hoo gi God nia ngadau e 300, gaa hai labelaa ana dama.
Mee gu mouli gu 365 ono ngadau i dono madua.
Mee nogo mouli e hai hoo ang gi God, gaa ngala, digi made, idimaa God guu lahi a mee gi daha.5.24 Hebrews 11.5; Jude 14
Methuselah ne 187 ono ngadau, gaa hai dana dama daane go Lamech,
ga mouli i nia ngadau e 782 gi nomuli. Mee guu hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 969.
Lamech ne 182 ono ngadau, mee guu hai dana dama daane,
ga helekai, “Mai di gelegele dela ne hagahalauwa go Dimaadua, di tama deenei ga haga dagaloaha gidaadou gi daha mo tadau haingadaa.” Gei mee ga haga ingoo a mee bolo Noah.
Lamech gu mouli i nia ngadau e 595 gi nomuli. Mee guu hai labelaa ana dama
gaa made ono ngadau gu 777.
I muli Noah ne 500 ono ngadau, mee gaa hai ana dama daane dogodolu go Shem, Ham mo Japheth.
